verse.name: c1
verse.lines: More love O Christ to Thee; newline More love to Thee, newline More love to Thee!

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: More love to Thee, O Christ, newline More love to Thee! newline Hear Thou the prayer, newline I make on bended knee. newline This is my earnest plea:

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Once earthly joy I craved, newline Sought peace and rest. newline Now Thee alone I seek; newline Give what is best. newline This all my prayer shall be:

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Then shall my latest breath newline Whisper Thy praise. newline This be the parting cry newline My heart shall raise; newline This still my prayer shall be:

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Let sorrow do its work, newline Send grief and pain; newline Sweet are Thy messengers, newline Sweet their refrain, newline When they can sing with me:
